content:
InstanceEncodingOption Enum

Definition

Contains options that specify whether the persistence provider should encode the instance state information using the GZip algorithm before saving the state information into the persistence store.

In this Article

public enum InstanceEncodingOption
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
InstanceEncodingOption

Remarks

.NET Framework version 4 ships with a SQL persistence provider as a constituent of the SQL Workflow Instance Store, which is a concrete implementation of the <xref:System.Runtime.Persistence.InstanceStore> class and is used to persist state information in to the SQL Server database. When the instanceEncodingOption attribute is set to GZip for the SqlWorkflowInstanceStore service behavior associated with a service, the SQL persistence provider uses the GZip algorithm to encode instance state information for the instance of the service before saving the state information into the SQL Server persistence database.

Fields

GZip

Specifies that instance data is compressed using the GZip algorithm.
None

Specifies that instance data is not compressed.
